website_summaries.verdict: Consciously designed and formulated for fun.
pros: Creates effortless glide in conditions from East Coast to West Coast
Ideal alternative to waiting in lines at ski shop
Should exceed expectations based on the low cost alone
cons: May require a bit more muscle to apply than other options

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: It's ok wax I thought it would be better because of the brand and price. I will be going back to hot sauce, can't beat the price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: but I have used it in the past and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been cold enough this year to use this block yet, but I have used it in the past and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Big hunk of wax, great price
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a big hunk of wax for a very fair price - that's all I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: bikerjff

customer_reviews.title: Gift item
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift, but the price was definitely better than at any of the local ski shops!! Recipient said it was a great item that worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Glide and Base protection.
customer_reviews.text: It works well for what it is. I Ski Colorado in December and February. Only one day did they seem sticky and it was approaching 40 outside. Otherwise does what it is supposed to do. We hot wax 4 pairs of skis. and do one hot wax strip at the end of the season. I go thru one bar a season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Raising the wax bar
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, melts a bit easier than other wax I've worked with and holds heat better so you have a little bit more time to work with the wax on the ski.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Who would use anything other than swix racing wax to get through the flats on a snow board? I got hooked on swix way back when I used to race.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the vendor
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be an expensive small block of ski wax. I was pleasantly surprised as to how much 180g of wax is! There is a lot of wax and will last several seasons, even if you hot wax your skis once a week. Since the season is over I have not had the opportunity to run my skis with this wax as I finish off my old supply. Prompt delivery. Recommend the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Allan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Wax
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty solid value wax. I've gone through about 1/5 of the wax bar from just waxing two boards. With free Prime shipping, I highly recommend this wax, and for the money...is a decent alternative to making the trip to your local snow sports store to buy their wax.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Q. Thai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best all purpose wax for alpine and Nordic. Good value too.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: so far pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: My first wax, no comparison with others, so far pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good inexpensive wax option. Red is very broad though, so buy 2x the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: BTB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wax, I have used many different waxes for ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Wax, I have used many different waxes for my ski's in the past. And this surpasses many of them!
customer_reviews.author: hummer16

customer_reviews.title: Nice broad temp wax
customer_reviews.text: This wax is a little easier to apply when compared to the cold temp version. It still requires some extra polishing work, but performs wonderfully on the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Reed

customer_reviews.title: All in all good for the price and lasted for most of the ...
customer_reviews.text: All in all good for the price and lasted for most of the day. When we went the high was about 33 but mostly stayed below 30.hopefully can test it on colder rides soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Swix Bio Degradable Ski/Snowboard Average Temperature Wax (180g Bar)
product_meta.description: Swix Bio Racing wax is easy to use and extremely effective. Perfect for many snow conditions. Very clean, fast and durable. User and !
feature_bullets: New biodegradable ski and snowboard wax from Swix
UR8 wax works best from 14 degrees to 36 degrees fahrenheit
Best for all skis and snowboards
Apply with an iron for best results
The best environment and user friendly wax on the market

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
